CustomField.description: This field is optional. This is a semicolon-delimited list of roles that are allowed to view the document preview and download the document. If left blank, all roles can view and download the document. This field is limited to 255 characters in length. This field is still respected, however, users should start using the newer Placeholder Viewer Roles field, which can accept more characters.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Semicolon delimited list of roles that are allowed to view the document. If blank all roles can view the document.
CustomField.label: Viewer Roles
